TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapUnknownHeader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader
Public NotInheritable Class SoapUnknownHeader Inherits SoapHeader

summary.span: 表示从接收方 XML Web services 或 XML Web services 客户端未能理解的 SOAP 标头中接收的数据。

span.span: Represents the data received from a SOAP header that was not understood by the recipient XML Web service or XML Web service client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 客户端可能使用超出 SOAP 标头形式的必需参数的附加数据调用 XML Web service。A SOAP client might invoke an XML Web service with additional data beyond the required parameters in the form of a SOAP header. 使用 ASP.NET 或 XML Web service 客户端创建的 XML Web service 可以在写入 XML Web service 时查看其不知道的任何 SOAP 标头，方法是将 具有 、或数组的属性应用于 XML Web service 方法。An XML Web service created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client can view any SOAP headers it did not know about at the time the XML Web service was written by applying a with a property of either an array of , , or an array of to the XML Web service method. 如果指定 ，则允许 XML Web service 以形式查看 SOAP 标头的内容 。Specifying a of , allows the XML Web service to view the contents of the SOAP header in the form of an . ## Examples `MyWebService`XML Web service 接受并处理 `MyHeader` 通过调用 XML Web service 方法发送的 SOAP 标头 `MyWebMethod` 。The `MyWebService` XML Web service accepts and processes the `MyHeader` SOAP header sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 此外，还会 `MyWebMethod` 接收 `MyHeader` soap 标头以外的任何 soap 标头。Additionally, `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlElement ^ Element { System::Xml::XmlElement ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlElement ^ value); };
member this.Element : System.Xml.XmlElement with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 请求或响应的 XML 标头元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML Header element for a SOAP request or response.

value.span: ，它表示 SOAP 标头的原始 XML。

span.span: An representing the raw XML of the SOAP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web service 方法要处理 SOAP 标头，则在写入 XML Web service 时，它并不知道它可以处理 表示 soap 标头的原始 XML 的类。If an XML Web service method wants to process SOAP headers it does not know about at the time the XML Web service is written, it can process an class representing the raw XML of the SOAP header. ## Examples 以下 `MyWebService` XML Web service 接收所有 soap 标头，包括 `MyHeader` 它知道的 soap 标头以外的标头。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service receives all SOAP headers, including ones other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header it knows about. `MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法将最后一个未知 SOAP 标头的 XML 特性返回给客户端，并将其作为字符串进行传递。The `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method returns to the client the XML attributes of the last unknown SOAP header passed to it as a string. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]
